name: OpenCars
description:
Get in your cab, find passengers and drop them off. A very simple simulation game of an everyday cab driver.

This entry is for the opengameart spring Jam.

Special Thanks to

OhjiroChan - https://opengameart.org/users/ohjirochan

melaniko - https://opengameart.org/users/melaniko

Segel - https://opengameart.org/users/segel

Carlos Alface - https://opengameart.org/users/Carlos-Alface

This game is still in development and many updates are planned.

Please like and follow.
